text: A sled, sledge, or sleigh is a type of vehicle that is used to travel over ice or snow. ==Sports that use sleds== * Bobsleigh * Luge * Sled dog racing ==Related pages== * Bobsled * Luge * Mudsled * Pulka * Qamutiik * Skeleton * Ski * Snowboard * Snowmobile * Toboggan * Travois ==References== ==Other websites== * North America's Horse Drawn Sleigh Rides Category:Winter sports Category:Land vehicles Category:Sports equipment Category:Animal-powered vehicles Category:Snow
title: Sled
